description:
June 8, 2017 /  Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Justine Barron, as well as guest panelists Baynard Woods and Aaron Morrison.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.
